attributes.action: Remove all thugs off the streets now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to live in a country where my family and I are safe.
Zero tolerance should be applied to these thugs.
How many more innocent, law abiding people have to die before these thugs are sorted?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
